title: "Son what is your goal in life"
body:
"_I want to be a better memer than a fish Daddy!_"
https://s31.postimg.org/4tr3l2ym3/Ladder.png
On that day Timmy's Dreams were broken.
Along with his bones
Edit:Updated with danker meme

replies.body:
Well, Laughing Fish eventually dies. Unless he's an AI made for memes. This would explain his nigh inability to express himself without the use of a gif
/s
